title: Helicopters Multiplayer Template
description: Fully controlled Multiplayer Battle Helicopter blueprint template comes with Multiplayer support, physics-based movement and weapon in which everything part is modular. All parts of the helicopter are animated in blueprint.
longDescription:
Demo

Project Preview

Custom Helicopter Setup

Custom Character Setup

Movement setup

Discord


Fully controlled helicopter blueprint template with Weapon system, Multiplayer Support, and physics-based movement in which every part can easily be replaced. All parts of the helicopter are animated in a blueprint not rigged with a skeleton mesh which means you just need to replace helicopter parts and you are good to go.


The Main feature of this Template is that you can use it for almost everything that flies up without any runup e.g. drone, airbus, helicopter, etc


Additional Note: The project needs HDRI Backdrop enabled it's there by default if not you can easily enable it from plugins



The template comes with Variables that can easily change from the details panel to get different results in movement.

1. Blade Speed:- how fast or slow will all blade moves

2. Rear Blade Speed:- how fast or slow will the rear blade move with respect to Blade Speed

3. Take-off speed:- how fast or slow it will take off after the blades start rotating 

4.UDSpeed Factor:- How fast or slow it can go up and down

5.FBSpeed Factor:- How fast or slow it can go forward and backward also will have some effect on the FBspeed of the Pitch

6.FBSpeed to Pitch:- How much it can rotate while moving forward and backward

7.RLSpeed Factor:- How fast or slow it can rotate right or left also will have some effect on RLSpeed to Roll

8.RLSpeed to Roll:- How much it can rotate while moving right and left

9. Yaw Rot Speed Factor: - How much it can rotate while taking yaw movement (arrow right and arrow left)


Helicopter control is possible using the keyboard, mouse, and Gamepad


Control system: for Keyboard and mouse

F = Enter the Helicopter

E = press & hold to Start & Lift-Up Helicopter

Q = press & hold to Stop & move down Helicopter

W/S = Once in the Air press and hold the key for Forward and Backward

A/D = press to rotate Left and Right

C = Switch Camera

6 = Press to activate the weapon system

7 = Switch to Machine Gun

8 = Switch to missile

9 = Launch decoy flare

LMB(Left_Mouse_Buttom) = Fire

RMB(Right Mouse Button) = Zoom in

Press 1 2 3 4 to Open and Close the Door

Press and hold the Arrow Right and Left for the Yaw movement


Control system: for Gamepad (Haptic feedback support)

Gamepad Face button Top / Y  = Enter the Helicopter

Gamepad Right shoulder / RB    = press & hold to Start & Lift-Up Helicopter

Gamepad left shoulder / LB     = press & hold to Stop & move down Helicopter

Gamepad left Thumbstick / LSB  = Once in the Air press & Hold key for Forward and Backward

Gamepad left Thumbstick / LSB  = press to rotate Left and Right

Gamepad D-pad Down        = Switch camera

Gamepad D-pad Up           = press to activate weapon system

Gamepad Face Bottom Left / X  = switch to machine Gun

Gamepad Face Bottom Bottom / A = switch to missile

Gamepad Face Bottom Right / Y = launch decoy flare

Gamepad Right Trigger Axis / RT = Fire

Gamepad Left Trigger Axis / LT  = Zoom in

Gamepad D-pad Left           = Yaw rotation left

Gamepad D-pad Right          = Yaw rotation right

Press 1 2 3 4 to Open and Close Door
technicalDetails:
Features: 

  • ThirdPerson support (Enter or Exit vehicle)
  • Multiplayer Support
  • BPI implemented
  • Enhanced input support
  • The high-quality assets with interior and exterior with 4k texture
  • Fire or shoot support with ground impact (Machine Gun, Missile, and Decoy Flare)
  • Haptic feedback while shooting from the gamepad
  • Helicopter UI
  • Zoom-in Support
  • Camera Switch (Thirdperson to Firstperson view)
  • Physics-based movement
  • Variables to change helicopter movement behavior
  • Modular Helicopter parts
  • The helicopter comes with Sounds
  •  All parts of the helicopter are animated.
  •  4 animated doors and 2 animated blades which can change to any numbers
  • Fully Optimize Assets


Number of Blueprints: 9

Input: Keyboard, Mouse, and Gamepad

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
